webforest 0.2.1

  • Changelog

Column helper: Percentage column

Source: R/classes-components.R
col_percent.Rd

Display numeric values as percentages with optional % symbol. By default, expects proportions (0-1 scale) and multiplies by 100.

col_percent(
  field,
  header = NULL,
  width = NULL,
  decimals = 1,
  digits = NULL,
  multiply = TRUE,
  symbol = TRUE,
  ...
)

Arguments

field

Field name

header

Column header (default field name)

width

Column width in pixels (NULL for auto-sizing based on content)

decimals

Number of decimal places (default 1). Cannot be used with digits.

digits

Number of significant figures (takes precedence over decimals if set). Cannot be used with decimals.

multiply

Whether to multiply by 100 (default TRUE, expects proportions 0-1). Set to FALSE if data is already on 0-100 scale.

symbol

Show % symbol (default TRUE)

...

Additional arguments passed to web_col(), including cell styling: bold, italic, color, bg, emphasis, muted, accent (column names)

Value

A ColumnSpec object

Examples

# Data with proportions (0-1), default behavior
col_percent("rate", "Rate")  # 0.05 -> "5.0%"
#> <webforest::ColumnSpec>
#>  @ id            : chr "rate"
#>  @ header        : chr "Rate"
#>  @ field         : chr "rate"
#>  @ type          : chr "numeric"
#>  @ width         : chr "auto"
#>  @ align         : chr "left"
#>  @ header_align  : chr NA
#>  @ wrap          : logi FALSE
#>  @ position      : chr "left"
#>  @ sortable      : logi TRUE
#>  @ options       :List of 1
#>  .. $ percent:List of 4
#>  ..  ..$ decimals: num 1
#>  ..  ..$ digits  : NULL
#>  ..  ..$ multiply: logi TRUE
#>  ..  ..$ symbol  : logi TRUE
#>  @ style_bold    : NULL
#>  @ style_italic  : NULL
#>  @ style_color   : NULL
#>  @ style_bg      : NULL
#>  @ style_badge   : NULL
#>  @ style_icon    : NULL
#>  @ style_emphasis: NULL
#>  @ style_muted   : NULL
#>  @ style_accent  : NULL

# Data already as percentages (0-100)
col_percent("accuracy", "Accuracy", multiply = FALSE)
#> <webforest::ColumnSpec>
#>  @ id            : chr "accuracy"
#>  @ header        : chr "Accuracy"
#>  @ field         : chr "accuracy"
#>  @ type          : chr "numeric"
#>  @ width         : chr "auto"
#>  @ align         : chr "left"
#>  @ header_align  : chr NA
#>  @ wrap          : logi FALSE
#>  @ position      : chr "left"
#>  @ sortable      : logi TRUE
#>  @ options       :List of 1
#>  .. $ percent:List of 4
#>  ..  ..$ decimals: num 1
#>  ..  ..$ digits  : NULL
#>  ..  ..$ multiply: logi FALSE
#>  ..  ..$ symbol  : logi TRUE
#>  @ style_bold    : NULL
#>  @ style_italic  : NULL
#>  @ style_color   : NULL
#>  @ style_bg      : NULL
#>  @ style_badge   : NULL
#>  @ style_icon    : NULL
#>  @ style_emphasis: NULL
#>  @ style_muted   : NULL
#>  @ style_accent  : NULL

# No % symbol
col_percent("pct", symbol = FALSE)
#> <webforest::ColumnSpec>
#>  @ id            : chr "pct"
#>  @ header        : chr "pct"
#>  @ field         : chr "pct"
#>  @ type          : chr "numeric"
#>  @ width         : chr "auto"
#>  @ align         : chr "left"
#>  @ header_align  : chr NA
#>  @ wrap          : logi FALSE
#>  @ position      : chr "left"
#>  @ sortable      : logi TRUE
#>  @ options       :List of 1
#>  .. $ percent:List of 4
#>  ..  ..$ decimals: num 1
#>  ..  ..$ digits  : NULL
#>  ..  ..$ multiply: logi TRUE
#>  ..  ..$ symbol  : logi FALSE
#>  @ style_bold    : NULL
#>  @ style_italic  : NULL
#>  @ style_color   : NULL
#>  @ style_bg      : NULL
#>  @ style_badge   : NULL
#>  @ style_icon    : NULL
#>  @ style_emphasis: NULL
#>  @ style_muted   : NULL
#>  @ style_accent  : NULL

# Using significant figures
col_percent("rate", digits = 2)
#> <webforest::ColumnSpec>
#>  @ id            : chr "rate"
#>  @ header        : chr "rate"
#>  @ field         : chr "rate"
#>  @ type          : chr "numeric"
#>  @ width         : chr "auto"
#>  @ align         : chr "left"
#>  @ header_align  : chr NA
#>  @ wrap          : logi FALSE
#>  @ position      : chr "left"
#>  @ sortable      : logi TRUE
#>  @ options       :List of 1
#>  .. $ percent:List of 4
#>  ..  ..$ decimals: NULL
#>  ..  ..$ digits  : num 2
#>  ..  ..$ multiply: logi TRUE
#>  ..  ..$ symbol  : logi TRUE
#>  @ style_bold    : NULL
#>  @ style_italic  : NULL
#>  @ style_color   : NULL
#>  @ style_bg      : NULL
#>  @ style_badge   : NULL
#>  @ style_icon    : NULL
#>  @ style_emphasis: NULL
#>  @ style_muted   : NULL
#>  @ style_accent  : NULL
